attributes.action: Make New Health And Safety Rules Reasonable
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Health and safety is becoming honestly a bit of a joke. Many people are in the following footsteps of this idea, but i don't actually know many of them. Whoever i ask or start the subject with  about health and safety, they immediate response of 'Health and safety is becoming a joke!'
So i personally believe health and safety, should perhaps be monitored by people who don't do ridiculous risk assessments and find something wrong with even a paper clip!
